CustomField.description: Was "GM Account Tier" prior to Feb '08 Go-Live with GM Changed from "Account Tier" to "CIB Tier" Field Label Rename from 'CIB Tier' to 'Global Tier', Nov '10. 01/2011: Added New Picklist Values 'Core, Opportunistic, Growth, Not Assigned'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Core - Strategic Relationship, Transact Multiple Products, Allocate Majority of Financial Resources. Growth - Mapping of Strategy & Needs indicate Future Core Client. Opportunistic - Once-Off Opportunities.
CustomField.label: Global Tier
